Package engine.manager

Class EntitiesManager

java.lang.Object
engine.manager.EntitiesManager
public class EntitiesManager
extends java.lang.Object
core class of the game, it manage all entity of the game, calling all update function of the game manage if you win or loose, and call the botManager
Author:
gautier

    this core method, adding all entity that need to be print on screen, then update the botManager after that it will update all entity of the game and remove entity when hp <= 0

    • createFighter

      public void createFighter​(int id, int faction, ForFighter patron, Position position, Position destination)
      creating a fighter
      Parameters:
      id - of the fighter can be INFANTRY,ARCHER,..
      faction - of the fighter
      patron - of the fighter
      position - of the fighter
      destination - if a rally point is set
      See Also:
      EntityConfiguration, ForFighter
